MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL52 postcode area of Pentrefelin. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5pm to complete repairs to faulty overhead equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, due to difficulties on site we now expect the power to be restored by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:03pm on March 31, 2021.
